uid.description: A unique identifier for the payment gateway assignment record.

gateway_uid.description: The unique identifier of the payment gateway being assigned.

directory_uid.description: The unique identifier of the directory to which the payment gateway is assigned.

created_at.description: The date and time when the payment gateway assignment was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the payment gateway assignment was last updated.

description: A payment gateway assignment entity that defines the relationship between a payment gateway and a directory.
